data.title: Persian Names: 655+ Catchy And Cool Names
data.meta_description: Many Persian people live in Iran. The language spoken in Iran is Farsi. They are all counted under the Muslim community.
data.meta_site_name: BrandBoy- Helping you Build A Brand From Scratch
data.text:
Many Persian people live in Iran. The language spoken in Iran is Farsi. They are all counted under the Muslim community—the Persian people living in rural and urban areas. Urban people invest their money in real estate and are good investors.

Rural people work in the agricultural field. They work in carpet industries and handloom industries. The carpet made by Persian people are very famous and reach the highest peak. They also do some other work like decorations material for homes.

If you are also fond of Persian and their qualities, check out some Persian names for you and your families.

Cool Persian Names

Persian communities are for ancient than the Mesopotamia community in Egypt. Persians were the ones who made roads to create the link between Asia, Europe, and Africa. People attract to their work, like weaving, architecture, metalwork, etc.

Deciding on a Persian name is not easy, so don’t worry. We made a cool Persian name list for you; here are some.

Karim – Generous, noble, honorable.

Abdalqadir – the one being Servant of the Capable

Jahangir – The World’s conqueror

Abdalmajid – the Servant of the Glorious One

Kamran – Prosperous and fortunate.

Jahan – A Persian word for the Universe

Mahmoud – Praise.

Jahangirkhan – He who conquered the world

Jahandar – He posseses the world

Goli – Rose Colored; A variant of name Golda

Catchy Persian Names

In ancient times Persian people were doing the business of gold and silver. They are known to be called gold- smugglers. Islam is the dominant religion in Persia.

Looks- wise Persian people are attractive. They have a fair skin tone. If you are thinking of giving a name to your baby, there are some catchy Persian names for your baby.

Sharyar – King of kings.

Abdallafif – the one who is a Servant of the Kind One

Bahar – Spring, Prime, Bloom, Beauty, Glory, Delight; Youth

Gelsomina – A kind of shrub with white color sweet smelling flowers.

Abdalmatin – the Servant of the Strong

Nader – Rare and exceptional.

Eskandar – Alexander the Great.

Jahankhatoon – A Persian poet

Kasra – Wise king.

Abdalmufi – the Servant of the Donor

Best Persian Names

Persian culture is the oldest culture on the planet. Persian has the oldest culture on the earth. People who live in Persia are very entertaining.

They love to crack jokes, are very polite, and give respect to elders and guests. We have made a list of the best Persian names for you – just pick one.

Changaz – An extremely brave man.

Abdalmalik – the one who is Servant of the King

Rostam – A legendary hero in Persian mythology. The son of Zal and Rudaba.

Jadu – One who is Magical

Parviz – The son of a Mughal emperor. Means fortunate and happy.

Homeira – A red man

Fereydoon – Persian mythical king and her.

Giti Giti – means World, Universe.

Chamali –The one who serves water.

Farnaz – One who is from hgh status and great

Amazing Persian Names

The old name of Iran is Persia, and most Persian people are non-vegetarian. They include non-veg in their every meal. Persian people are knowledgeable and pursue higher education degrees from Australian universities.

Persian names are beautiful. If you are confused about deciding on a Persian name for your baby, here are some amazing Persian names for you.

Abdalkarim – the Servant of the Generous One

Farjad – One who is endowed with wisdom

Nasser – Victorious.

Jaghan – Everything in the world

Firouz – Man of triumph.

Abdalrahim – the Servant of the Compassionate

Cyrus – Cyrus the Great.

Abdallah – the Servant of Allah

Khosrow – King.

Mansour – He who is Victorious

Awesome Persian Names

Persia is a beautiful city because of its tradition, culture, architecture, etc. Maximum Persians are Muslims. The Mongol community ruled over Iran. They are similar to Christian people. Persians have an awesome history.

If you are thinking of giving a Persian name to your baby, then we have made a list of some awesome Persian names for your baby. Check those out.

Baha al Din – Beauty of faith or a helper or supporter.

Hormoz – A Character in Shahnameh

Manuchehr – Heaven’s face – the name of a mythical Persian king.

Kai-Khosrow – Legendary king of the Kayanian dynasty.

Abdalmuhsin – the Servant of the Charitable One

Gharib – A known, familiar feeling

Baghish – Light rain that affects just a small area.

Homayoun – Royal; Fortunate; A variant of Homayun

Homa – A mythical Bird; Pheonix

Bahauallah – One who is Quiet,systematic and inventive mind
